thread.title: Watch The Trailer For HBO’s Animals Season 2 Which Will Feature Solange, Kim Gordon, Killer Mike, Big Sean, & More
thread.title_full: Watch The Trailer For HBO’s Animals Season 2 Which Will Feature Solange, Kim Gordon, Killer Mike, Big Sean, & More

author: Peter Helman
title: Watch The Trailer For HBO’s Animals Season 2 Which Will Feature Solange, Kim Gordon, Killer Mike, Big Sean, & More
text:
Lists Share < br />this article: Peter Helman @_peterhelman | 5:02 pm Share < br />this article: 
The first season of HBO’s animated series Animals featured Kurt Vile , A$AP Rocky , and A$AP Ferg , among others, and it seems that its upcoming second season won’t have any shortage of musical talent either. A new trailer teases guest appearances from Solange, Kim Gordon, Killer Mike, Big Sean, Usher, Big Boi, Kesha, and Ty Segall, who will apparently join Kurt Vile in playing a very squirrely version of himself on TV. Oh, and the trailer is soundtracked by Death Grips’“Hot Head.” Watch below. 
The second season of Animals premieres 3/17 on HBO.
